Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Very good prof. Takes the time to make sure you grasp and understand concepts. Always available for help. As for the class itself, you make your own grade, so to speak. Do all the homework, show up for class, take the tests and you will pass the class. You get out of it what you put into it. Hoping to take again in future.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: Very helpful. Take this guy if you\'re not very good at math and need someone who will take the time to explain things. Plus his classes are sorta fun.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: This was the worst math teacher at Triton that I EVER had! He doesn\'t really teach. Why & how did he even get hired in the first place?

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: To be honest, I am terrible at MATH (I must have ADD for it but I can\'t prove it), but for some reason I always pass that stupid placement exam. Mr. Conners is a great teacher, I can actually stay awake and focused during the lesson. He takes the time to help his students and wants to see them succeed.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)
comments: I don\'t know what is wrong with the people that made the negative comments. Mr. Conners is awesome. He is a great teacher, he spices math up with quirky stories and makes it not as tedious. And he makes fun of this website! I highly recommend him as a teacher. He works with his students and makes sure they are comfortable with the material.
